About This Page

The "Calendars" page is meant to show all available Calendars for your site, along with detailed information about them and filtering options for other pages of the site.

It makes use of the following function:

  • Calendar:Calendars to display a list of all available Calendars as well as detailed information about them.
  • Calendar:Cal to display a list of most recent upcoming event occurrences for each Calendar.
  • a link to a page with Calendar:iCalendar tag to allow users to export event data for a particular Calendar.
  • Calendar:Cal in Mini mode to display a Mini Calendar that links to days that have events.
